choices.A: From the Microsoft Endpoint Manager admin center, create a Windows Autopilot deployment profile. Assign the profile to all the computers. Instruct users to restart their computer and perform a network restart.
choices.C: From Windows Configuration Designer, create a provisioning package that has an EditionUpgrade configuration and upload the package to a Microsoft SharePoint Online site. Instruct users to run the provisioning package from SharePoint Online.
choices.B: Enroll the computers in Microsoft Intune. Create a configuration profile by using the Edition upgrade and mode switch template. From the Microsoft Endpoint Manager admin center, assign the profile to all the computers and instruct users to restart their computer.
choices.D: From the Azure Active Directory admin center, create a security group that has dynamic device membership. Assign licenses to the group and instruct users to sign in to their computer.
